description.description: A charity website made using React, Gatsby, HTML5/CSS(Sass), JavaScript, GraphQL and hosted by Netlify. Content is pulled from Contentful, and the homepage sections can be moved around by the user at will. Developed with a mobile-first mentality and translated from Figma design to production code. PayPal has been integrated to allow users to donate if they wish.

image.description: Respect for Refugees landing page and hero section

imageTwo.description: Main Body section of the website consisting of paragraphs and 4 images.
Donate section of the website, PayPal integrated.
